kw.name: New Browser
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": true, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "C:\\robot-tests\\browser\\traces\\temp\\3c434d03-fa91-4ecd-968f-486afdf1ac0a"}
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api, url=https://httpbin.org, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=10, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://httpbin.org/anything path_url=/anything headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '34', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"hello": "world", "answer": "42"}'

POST Response : url=https://httpbin.org/anything status=200, reason=OK headers={'Date': 'Thu, 23 Oct 2025 08:43:05 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '551', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Server': 'gunicorn/19.9.0', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': 'true'} body={ "args": {}, "data": "{\"hello\": \"world\", \"answer\": \"42\"}", "files": {}, "form": {}, "headers": { "Accept": "*/*", "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate", "Content-Length": "34", "Content-Type": "application/json", "Host": "httpbin.org", "User-Agent": "python-requests/2.32.5", "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-68f9ea99-75551a5d0295beed29ee4e57" }, "json": { "answer": "42", "hello": "world" }, "method": "POST", "origin": "109.235.33.80", "url": "https://httpbin.org/anything" }
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key`` / ``value`` must be found in a ``dictionary``.
